# How to Verify Connectivity with Appdome Android Browser

Last updated January 24, 2024 by Appdome

This Knowledge Base Article describes how you can verify connectivity with Appdome Android browser troubleshooting app between your mobile app and remote hosts. To assist users with the troubleshooting process, Appdome has created an Android browser app that is available to all users.  The browser app assists in troubleshooting host connectivity for Appdome-secured mobile apps.

## Prerequisites to Verify Connectivity with Appdome Android Browser Troubleshooting App

### Browser Android App

* The Browser app (available upon request at [support@appdome.com](mailto:support@appdome.com) or via the chat window on the Appdome platform.)
* Mobile Android device that can access App Server through the network.
* The server URLs your app connects to during its run time.
* [Appdome account](https://fusion.appdome.com/)
* [Signing Credentials](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/how-to-sign-my-app-on-appdome/) (e.g., signing certificates and provisioning profile)

## Guide to Troubleshooting Built App Connection to Hosts

After receiving the Browser Android App from Appdome Service Delivery team, you can Build it on Appdome with all features in your app’s use case.  Here is a helpful article on [Building apps with all desired features on Appdome end to end](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/how-to-fuse-an-app-end-to-end/).

After Signing the Built app Deploy it to an Android device.  Here is an Article on [Sideload installing Android apps through ADB](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/troubleshooting-secured-apps/sideload-secured-android-app-using-adb/).

## 4 Easy Steps to Verify Connectivity with Appdome Android Browser Troubleshooting App

Steps to using Browser Android:

1. Launch the app.
2. Enter a host or server URL that the mobile app will connect to and then click Crawl.
3. Enter a host URL and click GO.
4. You can test an app login after entering the login URL and then click GO.

![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Screen-Shot-2019-05-23-at-4.25.08-PM.png)

### Analyzing Results

With this Browser app, you can validate your connectivity status and the results of your mobile apps reaching the hosts that they need to reach.  If you need any assistance with troubleshooting and/or analyzing the results email [support@appdome.com.](mailto:support@appdome.com)

![appdome android browser troubleshooting app](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Screen-Shot-2019-05-06-at-3.39.46-PM.png)

* Crawl provides details on which URLs/hosts are accessed on the path to the URL you are going to.

![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Screen-Shot-2019-05-06-at-4.25.19-PM.png)

* Verify if this host is reachable to mobile apps by viewing results of the webpage when going to a URL.
* Validate app login results to see what is required for app login configuration.

### **How Do I Learn More?**

If you have any questions, please send them our way at [**support.appdome.com**](http://support.appdome.com/ "http://support.appdome.com/") or via the chat window on the Appdome platform.

### Thank you!

Thanks for visiting [**Appdome**](https://www.appdome.com/ "https://www.appdome.com/")! Our mission is to secure every app on the planet by making mobile app security easy. We hope we’re living up to the mission with your project. If you don’t already have an account, you can [sign up for free](https://fusion.appdome.com/ "https://fusion.appdome.com/").
